resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/157369</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>157369</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3284</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">A look at statistics that shape our life</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Blick auf Statistiken, die unsere Lebensdauer
formen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un regard aux statistiques qui forment notre vie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um olhar nos statistics que dão forma a nossa 
vida</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Uno sguardo alle statistiche che modellano la 
nostra vita</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα βλέμμα στις στατιστικές που διαμορφώνουν τη ζωή 
μας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una mirada en la estadística que forma nuestra 
vida</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An interesting internet based activity on the statistics that shape our life. Includes link to teacher instructions and to the sites which picture statistics to be used in the activity by the students.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">English</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">teaching strategies</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein interessantes Internet gründete Aktivität 
auf den Statistiken, die unsere Lebensdauer formen. Schließt 
Link zu den Lehreranweisungen und zu den Sites ein, die die darstellen
in der Aktivität verwendet zu werden Statistiken, von den 
Kursteilnehmern.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un Internet intéressant a basé l'activité sur 
les statistiques qui forment notre vie. Inclut le lien aux 
instructions de professeur et aux sites qui décrivent des 
statistiques à utiliser dans l'activité par les étudiants.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um Internet interessante baseou a atividade nos 
statistics que dão forma a nossa vida. Inclui a ligação às 
instruções do professor e aos locais que retratam os statistics a 
ser usados na atividade pelos estudantes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un Internet interessante ha basato l'attività 
sulle statistiche che modellano la nostra vita. Include il 
collegamento alle istruzioni dell'insegnante ed ai luoghi che 
descrivono le statistiche da usare nell'attività dagli allievi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα ενδιαφέρον Διαδίκτυο βάσισε τη δραστηριότητα στις
στατιστικές που διαμορφώνουν τη ζωή μας. Περιλαμβάνει τη 
σύνδεση με τις οδηγίες δασκάλων και στις περιοχές που 
απεικονίζουν τις στατιστικές που χρησιμοποιούνται στη 
δραστηριότητα από τους σπουδαστές.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un Internet interesante basó actividad en la 
estadística que forma nuestra vida. Incluye la conexión a las 
instrucciones del profesor y a los sitios que representan la 
estadística que se utilizará en la actividad por los estudiantes.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Strategien</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Statistiken</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">stratégies d'enseignement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">statistiques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Inglês</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">estratégias ensinando</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Inglese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">strategie d'istruzione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">statistiche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγγλικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">στρατηγικές διδασκαλίας</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">στατιστικές</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Inglés</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">estrategias de enseñanza</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">estadística</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
